title: Dr. Martens 1461 Made in England Brown Leather Oxfords UK 4
listperfectly_description:
Made in England Docs with classic yellow welt stitching in a compact UK 4 size.
Smooth brown leather 3-eye oxfords with a low-profile silhouette, air-cushioned sole, and stitched welt for everyday durability and heritage style.
Includes one pair of shoes.
- Dr. Martens 3-eye oxford shoes (pair)
Approximate measurements:
- Size / Fit: US M ~5 / US W ~6 / UK 4 / EU ~37 / AU ~4 / Width Reg
- Outsole length (heel-to-toe): ~10.1 in (25.7 cm)
- Outsole width (widest): ~3.6 in (9.1 cm)
- Insole length (heel to toe): ~9.2 in (23.4 cm)
- Insole width (ball area): ~3.1 in (7.9 cm)
- Heel height: ~1.1 in (2.8 cm)
- Weight (pair): ~2.4 lb (1.1 kg)
Pre-owned with visible creasing, scuffs, and edge wear; insoles show wear and soles have noticeable but even wear.
